pro.zackpollard.telegrambot.api.chat

Interface Chat

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ChannelChat, GroupChat, IndividualChat, SuperGroupChat
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChannelChatImpl, GroupChatImpl, IndividualChatImpl, SuperGroupChatImpl

    public interface Chat
    Author:
    Zack Pollard

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TelegramBot getBotInstance()
      Gets the TelegramBot instance associated with this Chat object
      default java.util.List<ChatMember> getChatAdministrators()
      Gets a List of ChatMember objects for all the people who are admin in the chat
      default ChatMember getChatMember(long userID)
      Gets the ChatMember object for a specific user based on their ID in respect to this chat
      default ChatMember getChatMember(User user)
      Gets the ChatMember object for a specific User in respect to this chat
      default java.lang.Integer getChatMembersCount()
      Gets the amount of people in the chat
      java.lang.String getId()
      Gets the ID of this Chat
      java.lang.String getName()
      Gets the name of the Chat
      ChatType getType()
      Gets the ChatType of this Chat
      default boolean leaveChat()
      If you call this method then the bot will leave this Chat if it is currently in it
      Message sendMessage(SendableMessage message)
      Send any type of SendableMessage to this Chat
      default Message sendMessage(java.lang.String message)
      Send a String message to this Chat

        Gets the ID of this Chat

      • sendMessage

        Message sendMessage(SendableMessage message)
        Send any type of SendableMessage to this Chat
        Parameters:
        message - The SendableMessage you want to send to the Chat
        Returns:
        The Message object associated with the sent message, or null if sending failed

      • sendMessage

        default Message sendMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Send a String message to this Chat
        Parameters:
        message - The String message you want to send to the chat
        Returns:
        The Message object associated with the sent message, or null if sending failed

      • getChatMembersCount

        default java.lang.Integer getChatMembersCount()
        Gets the amount of people in the chat
        Returns:
        The amount of people in the chat

      • getChatAdministrators

        default java.util.List<ChatMember> getChatAdministrators()
        Gets a List of ChatMember objects for all the people who are admin in the chat
        Returns:
        A List of ChatMember objects for all the people who are admin in the chat

      • getChatMember

        default ChatMember getChatMember(User user)
        Gets the ChatMember object for a specific User in respect to this chat
        Parameters:
        user - The User that you want the ChatMember object for
        Returns:
        The ChatMember object for this user or Null if the request failed

      • getChatMember

        default ChatMember getChatMember(long userID)
        Gets the ChatMember object for a specific user based on their ID in respect to this chat
        Parameters:
        userID - The ID of the user that you want the ChatMember object for
        Returns:
        The ChatMember object for this user or Null if the request failed

      • leaveChat

        default boolean leaveChat()
        If you call this method then the bot will leave this Chat if it is currently in it
        Returns:
        True if leaving the chat succeeded, otherwise False
